
(@ def vsphere_conf(values): -@)
[Global]
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.insecureFlag: -@)
insecure-flag = true
(@ else: -@)
thumbprint = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.tlsThumbprint @)"
(@ end -@)
cluster-id = (@=values.vsphereCSI.namespace @)/(@=values.vsphereCSI.clusterName @)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions: -@)
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A: -@)
[NetPermissions "A"]
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A.ips: -@)
ips = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A.ips @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A.permissions: -@)
permissions = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A.permissions @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A.rootsquash: -@)
rootsquash = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_A.rootsquash @)
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B: -@)
[NetPermissions "B"]
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B.ips: -@)
ips = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B.ips @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B.permissions: -@)
permissions = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B.permissions @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B.rootsquash: -@)
rootsquash = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_B.rootsquash @)
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C: -@)
[NetPermissions "C"]
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C.ips: -@)
ips = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C.ips @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C.permissions: -@)
permissions = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C.permissions @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C.rootsquash: -@)
rootsquash = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_C.rootsquash @)
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D: -@)
[NetPermissions "D"]
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D.ips: -@)
ips = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D.ips @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D.permissions: -@)
permissions = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D.permissions @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D.rootsquash: -@)
rootsquash = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_D.rootsquash @)
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E: -@)
[NetPermissions "E"]
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E.ips: -@)
ips = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E.ips @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E.permissions: -@)
permissions = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E.permissions @)
(@ end -@)
if (@ if values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E.rootsquash: -@)
rootsquash = (@=values.vsphereCSI.netpermissions.netpermission_E.rootsquash @)
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)

(@ end -@)

[VirtualCenter "(@=values.vsphereCSI.server @)"]
user = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.username.replace("\\", "\\\\").replace("\"", "\\\"").replace("\t","\\t") @)"
password = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.password.replace("\\", "\\\\").replace("\"", "\\\"").replace("\t","\\t") @)"
datacenters = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.datacenter @)"
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.insecureFlag: -@)
insecure-flag = true
(@ else: -@)
thumbprint = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.tlsThumbprint @)"
(@ end -@)

[Network]
public-network = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.publicNetwork @)"
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.region or values.vsphereCSI.zone: -@)

[Labels]
(@ # if useTopologyCategories is set as True, csi config uses topology-categories. Otherwise still use region,zone -@)
(@ if hasattr(values.vsphereCSI, "useTopologyCategories") and values.vsphereCSI.useTopologyCategories: -@)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.region and values.vsphereCSI.zone: -@)
topology-categories = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.region @), (@=values.vsphereCSI.zone @)"
(@ else: -@)
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.region: -@)
topology-categories = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.region @)"
(@ end -@)
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.zone: -@)
topology-categories = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.zone @)"
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)

(@ else: -@)

(@ if values.vsphereCSI.region: -@)
region = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.region @)"
(@ end -@)
(@ if values.vsphereCSI.zone: -@)
zone = "(@=values.vsphereCSI.zone @)"
(@ end -@)
(@ end -@)
(@- end @)

(@- end @)
